abstract: Ali Baba has discovered a cave full of gold and diamonds. How can he maximize the value of what he carries out?
snippet: Ali Baba has discovered a cave full of gold and diamonds. How can he maximize the value of what he carries out?
lead_paragraph: This week’s puzzle was suggested by Kenneth Kong, a TV personality in Singapore. Kenneth had a moment of global fame about a year ago after sharing the Cheryl’s Birthday problem, a simple challenge that went wildly viral (covered in Numberplay here). The problem generated quite a storm on Twitter, including suggestions for more puzzles. I asked Kenneth if he had a favorite, and he pointed to a suggestion by Igor Diev, who introduces his puzzle this way: “Frankly speaking, the task of #cherylsbirthday you’ve showed the world is rather easy and it’s a shame to be unable to solve it. Let me give you a task that Russian 14-year-old students solve. That’s what should really blow your mind.”
